sentence.idiomatic: Is your child adopted from the welfare agency?
The police sent this child to the welfare agency.
Every country has many Welfare Agencies.
You and your adopted son look alike.
This is my adopted daughter.
How many children have you adopted?
Do you know which ones are the local delicacies?
Local people don't like this type of snack.
The local doctor told me that this medicine is excellent.
Everyone please first complete the boarding procedure.
What procedures are there for getting a passport?
After we complete the rental agreement process, you can move in.
You look much younger than me.
You don't look like his mother at all.
Which movie star does he look like?
No wonder I didn't recognize her. She's new.
No wonder you were so angry. It turns out that he was late again.
No wonder you speak Chinese so well. You've been in China for five years.
Wow, your baby is so cute! Is she…?
She’s our newly adopted daughter.
No wonder she doesn’t look like you at all. But she is really pretty. Is she Chinese?
Yes, she was born in Hunan. We adopted her from the local welfare agency.
Do you live in China?
We live in the United States. She will return to the States with us.
In that case, is she a Chinese citizen or an American citizen?
After we finish the adoption process, she will be an American citizen. But we will educate her so she has a good knowledge of China and Chinese culture and we will make her to study Chinese.
That’s so good. She has such great parents, she will certainly be very happy.
Thank you! We will give her all of our love.
